message.entry: Character vector input arguments not supported.
Size and range inputs must be numeric.
First input must be a positive scalar integer value IMAX, or two integer values [IMIN IMAX] with IMIN less than or equal to IMAX.
Class name must be a class that supports RANDI, such as "double" or "single".
Argument following "like" must be a variable with a data type that supports RANDI, such as a double or single variable.
Complex or sparse input following "like" is not supported.
Sparse input following "like" is not supported.
